A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The Last Jedi was a refreshing change from the normal Star Wars themes\, an update from the older ideas. Interesting notions about authority\, failure\, the costs of war\, and being a leader vs a hero. The battle sequences at the beginning and end were a little intense for kids but otherwise it was fantastic. I don't quite understand the negative feedback. Sure some of the plot points were a little on the nose--like animal abuse and war profiteering are bad\, but otherwise it was fantastic.
